data.name: Sushi Rush
data.detailed_description:
About

This is a revolving sushi management game, you need to prepare the right sushi for your guests, within the guest's budget, by matching different kinds of sushi, as much as possible to satisfy the guests.

First, you need to order for your guests.
Second, You'll need to recommend sushi-paired snacks for your guests to maximize the income of individual guests.
Then, you need to finish the sushi making within a certain amount of time.
Finally, you need to do cashier and change.

After each day's business is completed, you will summarize your day's business.

Feature

The difficulty of the game increases dramatically as the levels increase, making it ideal for those who are more than willing to challenge themselves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
